scripts.build: echo building... && npm run clean && typings bundle -o dist/index.d.ts
scripts.test: echo testing... && npm run build && cd test && ts-node ../node_modules/blue-tape/bin/blue-tape "**/*.ts" | tap-spec
scripts.source-test: echo source-testing... &&  echo source-test is not specified
scripts.publish: npm -s run lint+build && echo please publish to typings/registry
scripts.build+test: npm run build && npm run source-test+test
scripts.lint+build+test: npm run lint && npm run build+test
scripts.lint+build: npm run lint && npm run build
